trans_title: 英国达人 第十三季
introduction: Series Thirteen of Britain's Got Talent, a British talent competition series, began broadcasting in the UK on 6 April 2019. This series will be the first amongst the programmes hosted by Anthony McPartlin and Declan Donnelly (colloquially known as Ant & Dec) to see the return of the former to his television duties, following McPartlin's absence from them to attend rehab prior to the start of the previous series' live episodes.
chinese_title: 英国达人 第十三季
